And she never walk down Lime Street anymore
Lime Street Station is the main train station in Liverpool, with links to many other parts of the country. She’s gone to prison and so can’t go where she pleases now.

That dirty no good robbing Maggie Mae
 This is a part of Liverpool, they returned me to
The song is sung from the point of view of the sailor.
A “homeward bounder” is slang for a sailor returning home from sea.
